upiPayment.title: यूपीआई भुगतान
upiPayment.instruction_1: Scan and Pay with any BHIM UPI app from your mobile
upiPayment.timeout_msg_2:
We did not received any payment yet. Please wait for few seconds until
we confirm any payment exists.
upiPayment.success_msg_2: Please wait you are connecting to doctor...
upiPayment.failure_msg_2:
Sorry, your transaction was not succeeded. If you made payment then
it will be refunded within 1 business day .
